review_blob:
Tasted at ItaliaBeerFestival Milan on March 10th. Very nice color, I appreciate the very good taste. I have to say that its more an APA than an IPA. But I like it because of the not heavy presence of american hops.
Good beer

Tasted at ItaliaBeerFestival Milan on March 10th. I expected more bitterness from a "triple": for me its a little sweet. Its colour doesnt excite me so much. I dont want to say that this "triple" is a bad beer! But I expected something different.
Tasted at ItaliaBeerFestival Milan on March 10th. A good beer, a new beer for me. Anyway I think it doesnt match enouhg the "saison" style.
